subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James was whistled for taking an extra step while driving for a potential tying layup with 2.3 seconds left, and the Cleveland Cavaliers lost at Washington, 80-77.
snippet: LeBron James was whistled for taking an extra step while driving for a potential tying layup with 2.3 seconds left, and the Cleveland Cavaliers lost at Washington, 80-77.
